channel.title: 317 Weapon Speed Help
channel.description: I need some help as the title says :) I wanna speed up my SS to whip speed and slow down my stat ham and speed up my vls. Help apreciated:)

item.title: 317 Weapon Speed Help
item.dc:creator: @jose3121 jose3121
item.description:
@jose3121 wrote:

im saying in simpler words

Make a copy of the server files
Find out the ids of the weapons that you want slowered and fastered
go to client.java and search the ids
it will look like this if (wearID == 4151) { // Whip playerSER = 1661; playerSEW = 1660; you can change that around and higher and lower the numbers and if that doesn’t work then search it again in client.java

} if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { // Whip playerSER = 1661; }

Or maybe here

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 1; wepdelay = 1; }

Read full topic

item.description:
@jose3121 wrote:

to be honest you can simply make a backup and test it… lol its very simple just make a backup and search for the item ids of the items and lower and higher the numbers and see if it works…
